description:
Awesome classic golf solitaire game better than ever.

This is just great solitaire to start play solitaire games and then later to move challenging solitaire games. Golf solitaire rules are very easy to learn, so it's a solitaire game for hole family. What are you waiting anymore...

[ Features ]

• game center leaderboard
• unlimited undo
• great game statistic
• responsive controls
• unique style
• play your own background music
• submit results to facebook
• relax and relieve stress
• smooth gameplay
• smooth and beatiful animations

[ HOW TO PLAY ]

This game is played with one deck of cards (52 cards).
1 stock pile (16 cards faced down)
1 foundation pile (1 card faced up)
7 tableau piles (5 cards faced up on each)

The top card of each tableau pile can be moved to the foundation pile if it is one number lower or higher than top card of foundation pile. Whenever there are no possible moves left from the tableau to the foundation, then click the stock to open new card to the foundation pile.
This solitaire is solved if you can clear all tableau piles and unsolved if stock have no card left.
